snippet: In a new book, Supreme Court Justice Stephen G. Breyer addresses the influence of foreign law and practices on American judicial decisions.
abstract: Supreme Court Memo; Supreme Court Justice Stephen G Breyer discusses his view that American law in an increasingly globalized world should be informed by foreign judicial trends; somewhat controversial approach is discussed in his book The Court and the World: American Law and the New Global Realities.
lead_paragraph: In a new book, Supreme Court Justice Stephen G. Breyer addresses the influence of foreign law and practices on American judicial decisions.

headline.main: Justice Breyer Sees Value in a Global View of Law
headline.print_headline: Breyer Sees Value in a Global View of Law

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: The Court and the World: American Law and the New Global Realities (Book)
